Package org.pdfclown.documents.contents.fonts

Font type definitions used to draw text inside content streams [PDF:1.6:5].

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CompositeFont Composite font, also called Type 0 font [PDF:1.6:5.6].
Font Abstract font [PDF:1.6:5.4].
MMType1Font Multiple Master Type 1 font [PDF:1.6:5.5.1].
SimpleFont Simple font [PDF:1.6:5.5].
StandardType1Font Standard Type 1 font [PDF:1.6:5.5.1].
TrueTypeFont TrueType font [PDF:1.6:5;OFF:2009].
Type0Font Composite font associated to a Type 0 CIDFont, containing glyph descriptions based on the Adobe Type 1 font format [PDF:1.6:5.6.3].
Type1Font Type 1 font [PDF:1.6:5.5.1;AFM:4.1].
Type2Font Composite font associated to a Type 2 CIDFont, containing glyph descriptions based on the TrueType font format [PDF:1.6:5.6.3].
Type3Font Type 3 font [PDF:1.6:5.5.4].
 

Enum Summary
Font.FlagsEnum Font descriptor flags [PDF:1.6:5.7.1].
StandardType1Font.FamilyEnum Standard Type 1 font families [PDF:1.6:5.5.1].
 

Package org.pdfclown.documents.contents.fonts Description

Font type definitions used to draw text inside content streams [PDF:1.6:5].
